Diet:
1) Men
	1) Module- Protien
	2) Module- Body Weight
2) Women
	1)Module-Protien 
	3)Module- Body Weight


Diet:
1) Calculation:(Subpackage)
	1) Module- Protien/ Carbs (Data work) 
		- Men (Default Values)
		- Women (Default Values)
		- Data Cereal 
	1) Module- To just the default heath conditions(manual)
		- men
		- women

2) Printing: (Subpackage)
	2) Module- Print the recommendation values
		- print the calculated results after intake 
		- include some animations
	2) Module-Men and Women:
		- Calculate the difference (Actual data and the default values)
		- Recommender(Inheritance)
